title: Server Lag

replies.body: just joined a game, took 3-4 secs for each message to go through, and champ to select, game ping normal, no other users on my network
i'm currently on my second bout of Queue dodge penalty because i  was clicking a champ and it didn't register my selection, it's only happened today and my ping ingame has been normal

Yeah I haven't experienced any issues there, but there'd be cases where I'd be walking to the enemy champs even though I'd commanded the champ to stop moving/move back?

Then when I was playing say Nidalee, I'd Q that would have a 3-4 second delay and then pressing R and anything else would either go instantly or have a delay making it painful to play (especially someone like Nid). 

In all made for a horrible gaming experience :(
